The Venture Bros.: A Meditation on Failure

Nostalgia is one of the more innocuous illusions in life. The New York Times reported that these rose-tinted memories of the past have tangible mental health benefits. With this in mind, it makes sense that, in these troubled times, movies studios are rushing to churn out remakes and reboots left and right.
